description:
You never know when you might need to run for your train or vault a slush puddle. An urban evolution of the Nova trail runner, the Nova 3 boots have an athletic pedigree. Constructed from soft synthetics and suede, these boots hug your feet and move with you. If you aren’t able to dodge a slush puddles, the waterproof liner and lightweight Primaloft insulation keep your feet dry and warm.

  • Waterproof construction seals out the elements while letting your feet breathe
  • 100g Primaloft® Gold Eco synthetic insulation traps warm air and is incredibly light
  • Cleansport NXT natural odour control keeps your feet smelling fresh
  • Medial zipper makes it easy to get in and out
  • Recycled laces, liner, and footbed
  • Bellows tongue keeps the outside right where it should be
  • Supportive EVA FloatPro Foam™ midsole uses 50% recycled material
  • Vibram® Icetrek® outsole rubber compound combined with a winter-specific tread provides excellent traction on frozen surfaces
name: Merrell Nova 3 Thermo Mid Waterproof Winter Boots - Men's
